movies.title: Bonté divine
movies.plot: Don Fabijan is a young priest who comes to serve on an unnamed small island in the Adriatic. In order to help increase birth rate on the island, he decides to pierce condoms before they are sold. He therefore teams up with the newsagent Petar and the pharmacist Marin. After they abolish all forms of birth control on the entire island, the consequences become more and more complicated.
movies.simplePlot: A young priest gets an idea to pierce condoms before they are sold in order to increase the birth rate of his island.

biography.bio: Kresimir Mikic was born on April 17, 1974 in Osijek, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Bonté divine (2013), The Lika Cinema (2009) and Fine Dead Girls (2002).
biography.name: Kresimir Mikic

biography.bio: Niksa Butijer was born on October 6, 1978 in Dubrovnik, Croatia. He is an actor, known for Bonté divine (2013), Quit Staring at My Plate (2016) and The Party (2009).
biography.name: Niksa Butijer

biography.bio: Marija Skaricic was born on August 6, 1977 in Split, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Fraulein (2006), Bonté divine (2013) and Mother of Asphalt (2010).
biography.name: Marija Skaricic

biography.placeOfBirth: Spisic Bukovica kraj Virovitice, Yugoslavia [now Croatia]
biography.bio: Drazen Kuhn was born in 1965 in Spisic Bukovica kraj Virovitice, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and director, known for Le fantôme de Tito (1999), Bonté divine (2013) and Witnesses (2003).
biography.name: Drazen Kuhn

biography.bio: Jadranka Djokic was born on January 14, 1981 in Pula, Croatia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Nasa mala klinika (2004), Bonté divine (2013) and Behind the Glass (2008).
biography.name: Jadranka Djokic

biography.placeOfBirth: Ravno Selo near Vrbas, Serbia, Yugoslavia
biography.bio: Lazar Ristovski is a famous Serbian actor, director, producer and writer. He has appeared on stage about 4000 times, and starred in over 40 films, TV series and TV dramas, mostly in lead roles. He was born into a family of Yugoslav colonists, his father being born in Macedonia and his mother in Montenegro. He graduated from the Faculty of Dramatic Arts of the University of Belgrade as an actor. Lazar Ristovski is a natural born actor. That is not shown only by a formal fact that he had more 4000 performances in all forms and in all genres of cinematic poetic. It is primary shown by a fact that he had with the same spiritual strength and brilliant impressiveness and autonomous authenticity played wondrous antinomies of Hamlet as well as incredible, almost ingenious stunts of the spirit in the writings of Gombrowicz, Aleksandar Popovic and the outstanding Dusan Kovacevic, as he also did in the first of his ingenious kinds in Moliere's incredibly jovial kandidorian expressions. Ristovski is, of course, a spirit with that formation which falls into mental tissue of a giant from Jasna Poljana, as well as the greatest of the greatest that is, Dostoevsky, and the dark ones, but also great ones - Ibsen and Strindberg. There is no theoretical assumption which could point out to any kind of mental system of a magnificent writer's spirit which Ristovski couldn't carry out in a voluminously exclusive, authentically introspective and psychologically suggestive manner and expressive form.
biography.name: Lazar Ristovski

biography.placeOfBirth: Siroki Brijeg, Bosnia and Hercegovina, Yugoslavia
biography.bio: Goran Bogdan was born on October 2, 1980 in Siroki Brijeg, Bosnia and Hercegovina, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and writer, known for Number 55 (2014), Sonja and the Bull (2012) and Some Other Stories (2010).
biography.name: Goran Bogdan

biography.bio: Zdenko Botic was born on September 9, 1946 in Zenica, Bosnia and Herzegovina. He is an actor, known for Bonté divine (2013), Red Dust (1999) and Zivot sa stricem (1988).
biography.name: Zdenko Botic

biography.bio: Filip Krizan was born on May 23, 1987 in Zagreb, Croatia. He is an actor, known for Bonté divine (2013), Nista osobno (2009) and Fabijan (2016). He has been married to Iva Viskovic since February 18, 2015. They have one child.
biography.name: Filip Krizan

biography.bio: Ivan Brkic was born on January 15, 1960 in Vinkovci, Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for How the War Started on My Island (1996), A Perfect Day: un jour comme un autre (2015) and Cashier Wants to Go to the Seaside (2000). He died on September 5, 2015 in Zagreb, Croatia.
biography.name: Ivan Brkic

biography.bio: Marinko Prga was born on January 1, 1971 in Split, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for No Man's Land (2001), Luda kuca (2005) and Les Vivants et les Morts (2007).
biography.name: Marinko Prga

biography.bio: Stojan Matavulj was born on February 24, 1961 in Novi Sad, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Ruza vjetrova (2011), Zakon! (2008) and On Shaky Ground (2014). He is married to Branka Matavulj. They have two children.
biography.name: Stojan Matavulj

biography.bio: Tihana Lazovic is an actress, known for Soleil de plomb (2015), On the Other Side (2016) and Hush... (2013).
biography.name: Tihana Lazovic

biography.bio: Senka Bulic was born on January 13, 1964 in Split, Croatia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for How the War Started on My Island (1996), Bonté divine (2013) and Pont Neuf (1997).
biography.name: Senka Bulic

biography.bio: Ana Maras was born on June 9, 1981 in Split, Croatia. She is an actress, known for Bonté divine (2013), Dirty Little Bubbles (2009) and Sampion (2010). She has been married to John Harmander since 2012. They have one child.
biography.name: Ana Maras

categories.category: Best Actor in a Supporting Role

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won A Look at the Balkans Award
